services.title: SERVICES
services.subtitle: Services I offer
services.frontEndDescription: Building responsive, cross-platform screens with SEO best practices, accessibility, and fluidity for the best user experience from a pre-provided design.
services.backEndDescription: Building RESTful API in TypeScript with Serverless Back-End and NoSQL database from AWS or GCP.
services.UIDesignDescription: Building wire frames, design systems and digital prototypes with focus on user, design and navigability.
services.IoTSolutionsDescription:
Consulting on cloud architecture for IoT systems: security and sensor authentication, two-way communication via MQTT protocol, BaaS (Back-end as a Service) realtime database and interactive dashboards for data monitoring.
Software development for embedded Linux and realtime data processing in Python 3.
services.acousticalEngDescription: Script development, task automation and/or complete solutions for acoustic measurements, digital signal processing and DataViz (data visualization) according to national and international standards.
services.othersDescription: Let me know more about your problem, I am open to new approaches to develop new solutions.

otoh.title: OTOH
otoh.description1: OTOH is an IoT intelligent sound monitoring service offered by Harmonia. In this project I am responsible for fullstack web development and programming the sensors on an embedded Linux system.
otoh.description2: As part of the Innovation Team, I was able to contribute not only in technical development, but in all stages of service conception, from market benchmarking, service/product design, to the conception of physical and digital prototypes.
